channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold could be the perfect mobile movie machine – and I can’t wait to try it out
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold could become the device of choice for watching movies on the go, with a larger screen than any tablet-style folding phone before it

item.title: Il est possible de recharger les piles non rechargeables, attention au piège sur la R5 électrique et les vélos électriques contrefaits – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Entre une innovation qui pourrait changer notre rapport aux piles alcalines, des désillusions pour les premiers acheteurs de la Renault 5 électrique, un rappel urgent de vélos à cause d’un défaut critique, et de nouveaux concepts de voitures électriques bluffants, il y a de quoi faire frémir les passionnés de mobilité décarbonée.

item.title: MasterClass subscriptions are on sale for 40 percent off for the holidays
item.description:
If learning a new skill is one of your New Year's resolutions, then you might want to know that MasterClass subscriptions are currently 40 percent off. This brings the top-tier subscription with offline mode and use on up to six devices down from $240 annually to $144. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $72 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessions and original series. You can learn about entrepreneurship from Richard Branson, screenwriting from Aaron Sorkin, cooking from Gord...

item.title: Snag a $100 gift card when you buy the Meta Quest 3 VR headset at Amazon
item.description: Amazon is throwing in a $100 gift card with the Meta Quest 3 VR headset right now

item.title: Russian court ruling could see $129 million freeze on some of Google's French assets
item.description: Google is facing a temporary freeze on €110 million in French assets.

item.title: Your LG TV may get an unremovable Microsoft Copilot app in its next update, and yes, users are annoyed
item.description: LG has added Microsoft Copilot to its customers' TVs –and they can't delete it

item.title: Beat the RAM price rises with this free Windows 11 hack for an instant speed boost
item.description: I’ll show you how Windows 11’s virtual memory hack can help you beat RAM price rises.

item.title: Les lunettes connectées d’Apple aurait un point commun avec l’Apple Watch
item.description: Apple préparerait des lunettes connectées ultralégères avec une autonomie de haut vol. Pour parvenir à concevoir l'accessoire, le géant de Cupertino miserait sur une puce proche de celle de l'Apple Watch.

item.title: Looking for a cheap SSD? Don't wait – Samsung could stop producing budget models soon
item.description: SSD price rises could hit budget drives hard, so buy now, don't wait – and there's more RAM misery in the cards too.

item.title: The DJI Power 2000 portable power station is down to its lowest-ever price — almost half off at Amazon
item.description: The DJI Power 2000 is on sale at Amazon for $699, down from the list price of $1,299. That's a 46% discount.

item.title: CEOs seem determined to keep spending on AI - despite mixed success
item.description: Slightly more CEOs plan on spending cash on AI as positive economic outlooks dwindle.

item.title: I tested Leica's divisive M EV1 — it's easier to the eye, but loses some of that rangefinder soul
item.description: The Leica M EV1 is the first Leica rangefinder without... the optical rangefinder. In its place, a useful EVF, which can make manual focusing much simpler.

item.title: Score $18 off the Lego Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 15, the Lego Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece is on sale at Amazon for $31.99 for a limited time. This is 36% off its list price of $49.99.

item.title: Eureka’s Christmas Vacuum Deals Are Practically a Holiday Clean-Out, Make Your Home Shine Like Never Before
item.description: There's a cleaning machine for every home available now at huge savings, from smart robots to amazingly versatile lightweight stick vacuums.

item.title: Mirelo raises $41M from Index and a16z to solve AI video’s silent problem
item.description: Mirelo, a German startup that is building AI to add synced sound effects to videos, has raised a $41 million seed round led by Index Ventures and Andreessen Horowitz.

item.title: Thea Energy previews Helios, its pixel-inspired fusion power plant
item.description: Thea Energy says that its planar-coil fusion power plant could be cheaper and easier to build thanks to AI-powered control software.

item.title: An Apple fan says they lost '20 years of digital life' after using an Apple gift card –here's what happened
item.description: A developer’s Apple Account got banned after they used a compromised gift card, locking away their digital life.

item.title: iOS 26.2 has added a handy feature to make notifications more noticeable
item.description: iOS 26.2 adds a feature that will flash the screen when an alert comes in, giving you a new way to know you've got a notification.

item.title: The incredible MacBook Air M4 is our laptop of the year - and you can get it for as low as $299 at Best Buy with these deals
item.description: The MacBook Air M4 is our laptop of the year and it's on sale now at Best Buy with $200 off and other ways to save even more. Here's why you need it.

item.title: Bose's new QuietComfort Headphones are 53 percent off
item.description: The holiday season is very much upon us and, whether you're traveling or need a last-minute present, noise-canceling headphones are a great purchase for this time of year. This is made all the more true when they're on sale. Take the Bose QuietComfort Headphones, which are down to $170 from $359. The 53 percent discount brings these headphones to a new record-low price — even better than their Black Friday deal. Bose released its new QuietComfort Headphones in October and they're an incredible option, especially for the sale price. It offers ANC with two modes: Quiet and Aware. It also has up...

item.title: Honor Pad 10 : cette récente tablette performante est déjà plus abordable grâce à cette offre
item.description: La Honor Pad 10 est une tablette milieu de gamme qui peut tout à fait accompagner les étudiants ou les travailleurs avec un petit budget. En ce moment, Honor la propose à 249,90 euros au lieu de 299,90 euros sur son site, avec un clavier offert.

item.title: The Echo Spot is back to its best-ever price at Amazon — save over $30
item.description: As of Dec. 15, the Echo Spot has returned to its lowest price yet of $44.99 at Amazon. This is 44% off its list price of $79.99.

item.title: Hollywood pays tribute to Rob Reiner after legendary director is found dead
item.description: Hollywood is paying tribute to director Rob Reiner after he and his wife Michele were found dead at their home in LA on Sunday.

item.title: Epic last-minute gaming laptop deal: get 26% off the Lenovo Legion with an RTX 5060 and OLED display
item.description: Lenovo makes some great gaming laptops and this Lenovo Legion gaming laptop deal is a fantastic option. Here's why you'll love it.

item.title: Cord-cutting is still getting worse for cable companies, but pay-TV subs just increased for the first time since 2017
item.description: Call it a television miracle. A new analysis has found that pay-TV subscriptions grew during the third quarter after eight straight years of decline. For the first time in eight years, pay TV is rising.

item.title: Kindle app now answers questions about the book you’re reading
item.description: Amazon has launched a new AI feature in the Kindle app that gives spoiler-free answers to questions about the book you're reading and confirmed that authors can't opt out from the feature. The company calls Ask this Book an "expert reading assistant" in its announcement and says that it's capable of answering questions about "plot […]

item.title: What is the release date for Emily in Paris season 5 on Netflix?
item.description: Emily's left the city of love in favor of a new life in Rome... but will it stick? And when is Emily in Paris season 5 on Netflix?

item.title: How to watch Strictly Come Dancing Christmas Special 2025 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Starring Fury from Gladiators and marking Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman's last hurrah, here's how to watch Strictly Come Dancing Christmas Special 2025.

item.title: Today's best Samsung Galaxy S25 deals: free devices, cheap plans, upfront discounts, and more
item.description: This week's best Samsung Galaxy S25 deals could see you taking home one of these stunning devices for free.

item.title: iOS 26 : ce bug étrange gâche les photos importées d’Android
item.description: Des utilisateurs d'iPhone rapportent un dysfonctionnement agaçant sous iOS 26. Certains clichés transférés depuis un smartphone Android s'affichent avec un filtre rouge vif inexpliqué, rendant le partage de photos entre les deux écosystèmes plus chaotique que jamais.

item.title: Apple TV announces a huge Pluribus milestone in the most Pluribus way
item.description: Apple TV announced that "Pluribus" is its most watched series, reportedly surpassing popular shows like "Severance" and "Ted Lasso."

item.title: Even Uber has an end-of-year wrap-up now
item.description: End-of-year wrap-ups were popularized by Spotify, and these days you can look back on the last 12 months of listening with most of the music streaming apps, as well as your gaming and YouTube viewing habits. The next logical step? A full recap of all of the Uber trips and takeaways you’ve guiltily ordered this year, of course! Uber is calling its new wrap-up feature, which launches today, "YOUBER", and it takes into consideration both your Uber and Uber Eats usage. You can see where you went, how often you demanded Uber Comfort, and how frequently you returned to the same pizza place on Uber E...

item.title: Casser l’écran du Galaxy Z TriFold ? Voici la facture (et c’est du jamais vu chez Samsung)
item.description: Si le tarif d’achat du Galaxy Z TriFold est déjà élitiste, la facture pour remplacer son immense dalle interne établit un nouveau record historique pour Samsung.

item.title: James Cameron Won’t Let Netflix Buying Warner Bros. Kill Theaters
item.description: Eywa as his witness, James Cameron has pledged to make movies for theaters so that side of the business stays alive.

item.title: This Startup Wants to Build Self-Driving Car Software—Super Fast
item.description: The autonomous vehicle industry is heating up thanks to advances in AI. But can those same innovations help startups like HyprLabs build safe tech?

item.title: 7 Best Desktop Computers (2025): Gaming, Macs, Compact, and More
item.description: Despite advancements in laptops, desktop computers still have a place. These are the WIRED-tested options you should consider.

item.title: Feeding the machine
item.description: When he was 19 years old, Brendan Foody started Mercor with two of his high school friends as a way for his other friends, who also had startups, to hire software engineers overseas. It launched in 2023 as essentially a staffing agency, albeit a highly automated one. Language models reviewed resumes and did the interviewing. […]

item.title: Engadget's best of 2025
item.description: Engadget has been reviewing the latest devices for over two decades, adding well over 100 in-depth product tests to our tally every year. For 2025, we have compiled a list of the best gear we reviewed this year based on the highest review scores in each category. From Pixel to iPad, and Switch 2 to Sony WH-1000XM6, our reviews team has spent thousands of hours testing new products this year to discover the best of the best. Now it’s your turn to rediscover the best gadgets of 2025, including explanations from our editors as to why these products were rated so highly. Best overall phone: Google...

item.title: Got Gmail? This is the simple signature tool you’ve been missing
item.description: Create clean and effective sign-offs in seconds with this smart new setup. When you’re trying to snazz up your emails with a signature at the bottom, it’s all too easy to overthink it.

item.title: 8 authors recommend books that will help you lead in 2026
item.description: As our noted authors explain, this eclectic list of books will help any leader navigate the uncertainty of the year to come. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: iRobot has been saved from oblivion by a mysterious Chinese robo-vac giant – here's what that means
item.description: iRobot has filed for bankruptcy, but promises there won't be any immediate changes for product owners.

item.title: Driverless Tesla Robotaxi spotted in Austin
item.description: A fully driverless Tesla Robotaxi was spotted riding around in Austin, Texas.
